title: Compass: The Journey of the Soul from Egypt to the Promised Land
description: There is a map that each soul can follow to obtain spiritual enlightenment while on Earth. Every great spiritual leader has followed this road Moses, Buddha, Christ, and countless others. The path is open to all who decide to take a journey into the unknown depths of their soul.Where are you in spiritual consciousness in every area of your life? There are six stages of spiritual • Egypt• Red Sea• Wilderness• Jordan River• Promised Land• Christ ConsciousnessThis spiritual book will serve as your guide as you traverse through the lands, i.e., stages of spiritual development in your consciousness. Although Compass is written from a metaphysical perspective, the stages of spiritual development are universal, and the archetype of these stages can be found in every religion or spiritual practice.Are you in Egypt, at the Red Sea, the Wilderness, the Jordan River, or the Promised Land? Perhaps a few of us have even transcended spiritually to the Christ Consciousness stage of spiritual development.Where are you in consciousness in the life areas of work, your personal life, a relationship with yourself and others? What do you have to do to evolve spiritually?To find out read The Journey of the Soul from Egypt to the Promised Land , by Penelope V. Yorke. The journey of the soul awaits you.Penelope
author: Penelope V. Yorke
